name: Proteus
body:
PROTEUS ROS stack (demo)
========================

    sudo easy_install -U rosinstall
    cd ~/work # change dir to your workspace
    rosinstall . /opt/ros/electric http://anr-proteus.github.com/proteus.rosinstall 

***

[install slides](http://bit.ly/proteus1) - [demo slides](http://bit.ly/proteus2)

***

http://anr-proteus.fr
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
